resources.string:
1. Enable NFC and Android Beam
 (you can use the settings above).
 2. Choose a contact to highfive
(your choice will be remembered).
 3. Highfive this device with another that supports Android Beam and NFC.
Uh oh, NFC is disabled!\n Enable it via the setting icon above.
Uh oh, Android Beam is disabled!\n Enable it via the setting icon above.
Please choose a contact to highfive.\nWhy not yourself?
"I couldn't find a contact with that phone number. Want to try another number?"
This is who you\'ll highfive to others!
